SEARCH
Package eu.kartoffelquadrat.zoo

Class Zoo

java.lang.Object
eu.kartoffelquadrat.zoo.Zoo
public class Zoo extends Object
Principal class of the Zoo, offering all relevant public functionality. Access to public methods of this implementation is demonstrated in the DesktopLauncher class. This class is a singleton.
Author:
Maximilian Schiedermeier
